trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data accepted by the block's first target.
trans-unit.target: 指定區塊的第一個目標所接受的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data accepted by the block's second target.
trans-unit.target: 指定區塊的第二個目標所接受的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data accepted by the block's third target.
trans-unit.target: 指定區塊的第三個目標所接受的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: Provides a dataflow block that joins across multiple dataflow sources, which are not necessarily of the same type, waiting for one item to arrive for each type before they’re all released together as a tuple that contains one item per type.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料流程區塊，跨多個資料流程來源 (不一定是相同的型別) 聯結 (join)，並等待每一種類型的一個項目抵達後，才會將它們當做 tuple (包含每一種類型的一個項目)，全部一起釋放。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock`3" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock`3" />。

trans-unit.source: The options with which to configure this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來設定這個<see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock`2" /> 的選項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock`3" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock`3" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Signals to the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> 發出訊號，表示不應接受也不應產生任何其他訊息，也不應使用任何其他延後的訊息。

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock%603.Complete%2A> has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock%603.Completion%2A> task will enter a final state after it has processed all previously available data.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock%603.Complete%2A>已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成，且其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock%603.Completion%2A>工作會進入最終狀態它已經處理所有先前可用的資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock%603.Complete%2A> will not block waiting for completion to occur, but rather will initiate the request; to wait for completion to occur, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock%603.Completion%2A> task may be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock%603.Complete%2A> 將區塊等待完成發生，而是會起始要求但要等待完成發生，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock%603.Completion%2A>可能使用的工作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />，其表示非同步作業和資料流程區塊的完成。

trans-unit.source: The task.
trans-unit.target: 工作。

trans-unit.source: A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages.
trans-unit.target: 資料流程區塊會時視為完成它目前未處理的訊息，以及當它有保證，不會處理任何其他訊息。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>完成相關聯的區塊時，會轉換為已完成狀態。

trans-unit.source: It will transition to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion> state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block’s defined semantics.
trans-unit.target: 會轉換到<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>區塊完成其處理成功根據資料流程區塊時的狀態定義語意。

trans-unit.source: It will transition to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted> state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to receiving a cancellation request.
trans-unit.target: 會轉換到<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>狀態時即為資料流程區塊已完成處理提前因未處理的例外狀況，且會轉換到<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>資料流程區塊完成狀態過早處理，因為收到取消要求。

trans-unit.source: If the task completes in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted> state, its `Exception` property will return an <xref:System.AggregateException> containing the one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail.
trans-unit.target: 當工作在<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>狀態，其`Exception`屬性會傳回<xref:System.AggregateException>包含造成失敗之區塊的一或多個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The target block to which to connect this source.
trans-unit.target: 要連線到此來源的目標區塊。

trans-unit.source: An object that configures the link.
trans-unit.target: 設定連結的物件。

trans-unit.source: Links the source block to the specified target block.
trans-unit.target: 將來源區塊連結至指定的目標區塊。

trans-unit.source: A disposable object that unlinks the source from the target when its <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫 <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> 方法時，會將來源從目標取消連結的可處置物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="linkOptions" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="linkOptions" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of output items available to be received from this block.
trans-unit.target: 取得可從此區塊接收的輸出項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of output items.
trans-unit.target: 輸出項目的數目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that caused the faulting.
trans-unit.target: 導致錯誤的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Causes the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> to complete in a <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: 造成 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> 在 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> 的狀態中完成。

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock%603.System%23Threading%23Tasks%23Dataflow%23IDataflowBlock%23Fault%2A> has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock%603.Completion%2A> task will enter a final state.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock%603.System%23Threading%23Tasks%23Dataflow%23IDataflowBlock%23Fault%2A>已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成，且其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.JoinBlock%603.Completion%2A>工作將會進入最終狀態。

trans-unit.source: Faulting a block, as with canceling a block, causes buffered messages (unprocessed input messages as well as unoffered output messages) to be lost.
trans-unit.target: 判定為失敗的區塊，做為與取消區塊，會造成遺失緩衝的訊息 （未處理的輸入的訊息，以及 unoffered 的輸出訊息）。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="exception" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="exception" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a target that may be used to offer messages of the first type.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用來提供第一個類型之訊息的目標。

trans-unit.source: The target.
trans-unit.target: 目標。

trans-unit.source: Gets a target that may be used to offer messages of the second type.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用來提供第二個類型之訊息的目標。

trans-unit.source: The target.
trans-unit.target: 目標。

trans-unit.source: Gets a target that may be used to offer messages of the third type.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用來提供第三個類型之訊息的目標。

trans-unit.source: The target.
trans-unit.target: 目標。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the formatted name of this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> 執行個體之格式化名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the formatted name of this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> 執行個體之格式化名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: Inherited from <xref:System.Object> .
trans-unit.target: 繼承自<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlockOptions.NameFormat%2A> option.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlockOptions.NameFormat%2A>選項。

trans-unit.source: The predicate value must successfully pass in order for it to be received.
trans-unit.target: 述詞的值必須成功傳遞才能讓它接收。

trans-unit.source: <c>filter</c> may be <see langword="null" />, in which case all items will pass.
trans-unit.target: <c>filter</c> 可能是 <see langword="null" />，這種情況下將傳遞所有項目。

trans-unit.source: The item received from the source.
trans-unit.target: 從來源接收的項目。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to synchronously receive an available output item from the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IReceivableSourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試以同步方式從 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IReceivableSourceBlock`1" /> 接收可用的輸出項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an item could be received; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以接收項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block waiting for the source to provide an item.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖等候提供項目來源。

trans-unit.source: It will return after checking for an element, whether or not an element was available.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回之後檢查的項目，或有可用的項目。

trans-unit.source: The items received from the source.
trans-unit.target: 從來源接收的項目。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to synchronously receive all available items from the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IReceivableSourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試以同步方式從 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IReceivableSourceBlock`1" /> 接收所有可用項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if one or more items could be received; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法收到一或多個項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block waiting for the source to provide an item.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖等候提供項目來源。

trans-unit.source: It will return after checking for elements, whether or not an element was available.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回之後檢查項目，或有可用的項目。
